gui.element
Class Line

java.lang.Object
  gui.element.Line

public class Line
extends java.lang.Object

This class is for storing references to perpendicularly connected lines through a given cell.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Alvin Moradi with contributions from the "AWESOME SAUCE" team

Field Summary
private  Cell[] cells
           
private  int count
           
private  boolean isShaded
           
 
Constructor Summary
Line(boolean flag)
          Constructor for instantiating a new Line object for cells to claim parental relation to; that later will be called to highlight all related cells dynamically.
 
Method Summary

          Function to add an additional cell on to the stack of cells linked along this line.

count

isShaded

Constructor Detail

Line

public Line(boolean flag)
Constructor for instantiating a new Line object for cells to claim parental relation to; that later will be called to highlight all related cells dynamically.

Parameters:
flag - Boolean flag used to impose shade on this line of cells (should generally instantiate with false);
Method Detail

add

public void add(Cell cell)
Function to add an additional cell on to the stack of cells linked along this line.

Parameters:
cell - The cell to be added as an inclusion to this line of cells

setHighlighted

public void setHighlighted(boolean flag)
Function to manipulating the highlighted background state of this cell.

setShaded

public void setShaded(boolean flag)
Function to manipulating the shaded background state of this cell.

isShaded

public boolean isShaded()
Getter method for the shaded state of current cell;

Returns:
A boolean value denoting the shaded state of this
